name: DALITSANGH

address: H.No-13 Lata Marg Mitra Kunj Near Old Police Station

briefDescription: Dalit Sangh has been working from last 26 years for a class of society which has been victim of ignorance. Dalit sangh was established in 1985 by Dr.Gopal Narayan Authey. Dalit Sangh, committed for the social, political and educational upliftment of the Dalits and the weaker section of the society. Dalit Sangh is a non-political, non-profit making, non-government, and secular, grass root voluntary organization. It is registered under Madhya Pradesh State Society Registration Act 1973. (Code 44 of 1973). It is working in the Backward & Tribal Areas of Hoshangabad and Harda Districts of Madhya Pradesh. It works with the people who are marginalized from the main stream of society, so called DALITS. The organization has focus of BelPardhi,
